title: Royal Enfield may unveil new Bullet 350: Engine, price, performance. Here's all what to expect
description: Royal Enfield is rumored to be launching a new-gen Bullet 350, as the company has sent out invitations for an event scheduled for August 30 to September 1. The teaser suggests that the motorcycle will retain its retro appeal and iconic acoustic charm. It is expected to retain the J-series 349 cc engine, delivering 20.21 PS of maximum power and 27 Nm of peak torque, and the estimated base price is Rs 1.7 lakh.
